entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
